post.body: as if there want already a reason to go to vegas... u just sealed the deal, well, let's hope warehouse cooperates. thank u
u going?
yep. i'm sooo excited!
u know the movie? LOL
i love any and every movie she's in especially overboard. i love her.
poor guys, we sure r hard to figure out sometimes. Hair/no hair. i love the cheekbones. seems like he lost weight, huh?
even tho a fantasy-or 2-includes u doesn't mean that i don't respect a loyal family man..u've gotta b hercules tho:
ur groupies r so cute.i'm one of them but you got a lot of cuties to choose from... women r gorgeous rn't they? u strong man?
u mean bald??? haha
shit. but what about the huge gig / record deal u'll land the week before that?? u'll b forced to stay in LA
good point. very true. :) that cud be tweaked into a good mantra =)-
lol to both tweets =) agreed
i don't know what it is, but i think bald is kinda sexy. ben bernanke sends me. am i wierd??
stubble. 5oclock shadow is sexy. for me the deal breakers are goatees, mustaches, beards..generally at least- as dave's pic proves
well, we all have to do our part for the environment....thanks for sparing the ice caps... :)
LOL!! is desperatoe still up to the old trix?? oh gawd!!
no I mean clear n breathable!
I think fashion sq. The air here is sick... U probably know somethin about that in colorado huh?
which one is better? I need to do some last minute xmas shopping. My family's gonna meet me here tomorrow...
lol! Sounds like fun!
vip for N2 regular for N1 cuz its all a gurl on abudg cud afford. :( gud nite luvahs!
ticket req. as we tweet
good nite. i'm checkin' long day. long nite ahead. sleeplessness sux. i'll watch overboard for the 122nd time this decade to sleep. i luv it
life is quite a complex puzzle isnt it?? or is it cuz i'm smokey? the puzzle can be solved. i'm really good at puzzles.
how does that saying go?? something about the more you r given the more you is expected of you... i guess, it applys in many ways.
i like a shaved head... its sexy. but i loooooove hair. a full head of it..n dark preferably. altho my hott ff's is ash brown..uuumm um um
Paradise valley mall. Tatum n cactus. / scottsdale n camelback fashion sq...
